name: Space Shooter Game (GamingMan215)
description:
Controls: WASD or Arrow keys to move, and left-mouse click to shoot.

Fly through space and shoot down hostile aliens and colorful asteroids. Each color of asteroid has a different effect on your firing rate and your score so beware.

Red ones force your firing rate to slow down and take 10 points off your score, gold ones cause the firing rate to speed up while giving 25 points, and cobalt blue ones set your firing rate back to normal, giving a standard 15 points. Normal Asteroids do nothing to the firing rate, giving 15 points. Shooting the aliens is worth 20 points.

Click the download button and enjoy.
